description: Presents a checklist based on a selected checklist group from a Bill of Lists, allowing users to fill various field types and capturing their inputs in a recipe variable.
intent: To guide users through a series of checklist items and record their responses for documentation and compliance.
preconditions: Bill of Lists attached to the unit procedure
postconditions: Checklist responses stored in recipe variable
side_effects: Creates recipe variable to hold entered checklist values
example_usage: Operator selects the 'Safety Checklist' group, completes Yes/No and text entries for each item, then clicks Finish to record the responses.
